text: Dennis Haskins (born November 18, 1950) is an American actor. He is known for his role as principal Richard Belding in the teen sitcom Saved by the Bell which ran from 1989 to 1993 on NBC. He then went on to star in Saved by the Bell: The New Class, which aired from 1993 to 2000. He also portrayed the role as a regular in Good Morning, Miss Bliss. ==References== ==Other websites== * Dennis Haskins Website * * Dennis Haskins at The New York Times Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chattanooga, Tennessee
title: Dennis Haskins
